name: Port of San Fransokyo Cervecería
location: Disney California Adventure Park, San Fransokyo Square

items.title: Breakfast Croissant
items.description: with Bacon, Eggs, Jalapeños, Cheese, Green Onions and Sesame Seeds

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Karlitos Mexican Lager
items.description: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Karlitos Mexican Lager (ABV 4.4%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Karlitos Mexican Lager Michelada
items.description: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Karlitos Mexican Lager Michelada (ABV 4.4%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Oktoberfest
items.description: San Diego, CA (ABV 5%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, 70th Anniversary IPA, San Diego CA. (ABV 7.0%)
items.description: An intensely single-hopped American IPA bursting with Grapefruit Aromas, Citrus, and Tropical Fruit Flavors (ABV 7.0%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Red Trolley Ale Michelada
items.description: Michelada with Karl Strauss® Red Trolley Ale

items.title: Fieldwork Day Money Non-Alcoholic Grapefruit Blonde Ale
items.description: Non-Alcoholic Golden Ale with a subtle Malt profile, light Fruity hoppiness, and exceptionally bright finish of Grapefruit. (ABV <0.5%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Frank the Dank Double IPA
items.description: A hop forward American Double IPA bursting with Pine, Orange and Tropical Aromas and flavors with a dry crisp finish (ABV 8.5%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Battle Bot Blonde
items.description: Easy drinking and crisp with a slight biscuity malt sweetness that's refreshing and bright. (ABV 4%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Battle Bot Blonde Michelada
items.description: Michelada with Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Battle Bot Blonde

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Follow the Sun Lager Michelada
Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Moment of Zen Yuzu Japanese Rice Lager Michelada
Beer Flight
items.description: choice of four Karl Strauss® Brewing Company Beers

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Follow the Sun Lager
items.description: An easy, crisp, refreshing Lager with a clean, light finish (ABV 4.2%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Moment of Zen with Yuzu, Japanese Rice Lager with Yuzu
items.description: Refreshing Japanese rice lager with floral and citrus notes from the addition Yuzu that finishes crisp and clean. (ABV 4.2%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Red Trolley Ale
items.description: Hints of Raisins and Currants with a Deep Copper Color and Coffee Flavor (ABV 5.8%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Aurora Hoppyalis IPA
items.description: Robust Flavors and Aromas of Tropical Fruit, Pine and Tangerine with a Dry, Crisp Finish (ABV 7.0%).

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Boat Shoes Hazy IPA
items.description: Flavors of Citrus and Sweet Fruit that Lingers through a Juicy Finish (ABV 7.2%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, Windansea Wheat
items.description: Aromas of Banana, Clove and a Hint of Vanilla (ABV 5.1%)

items.title: DASANI® Bottled Water
